titles.title: Youth Coastal Fishing Program Act of 2022
Youth Coastal Fishing Program Act of 2022
A bill to direct the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration to establish a grant program to fund youth fishing projects.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Youth Coastal Fishing Program Act of 2022
This bill directs the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) to establish a program to award grants and provide technical assistance to certain entities for youth fishing projects.
In awarding grants, NOAA must prioritize applicants with proposals for youth fishing projects that focus on an underserved community.
